name: Tokelau - Isle of Survival
description:
Tokelau- Isle of Survival is a First Person experimental experience visualizing human emotion.  Players will navigate and traverse through the island  environment at night in the middle of a storm. You need to figure out how to survive and escape the island... This is a hard game and meant to be hard... there are no saves and no one is there to help you figure it out...

Just FYI

This experience is not for everyone. Tokelau- Isle of Survival is a exploratory puzzle simulator that conveys themes and emotions through the environment. 

You are likely to experience the following themes and emotions:

  • Anger
  • Frustration
  • Problem Solving
  • Loneliness / Solitude
BEST EXPERIENCED WITH HEADPHONES

This is my first Unity project started as a  tutorial by Pete Jepson on Udemy called "Make a horror survival game in Unity", which I highly recommend...

Through the process of learning to make the game I departed from his lecture and created this game. Even if this type of Genre isn't to your liking I would greatly appreciate it if you gave it a play through. 

 Feedback

Any sort of feedback or comments are greatly appreciated, whether it be good or bad, it's important for me as a designer to understand what I could be doing better in my future projects and what I'm currently doing right to better adapt and further expand my skills.
